response.message:
Kudos on the sound quality on both #9 and #10. I know you felt you had a few problems with Greg's mic in #9, but, over the course of the entire show, things were much improved over what we heard in 1#-#8. 

I criticized several of those shows for their sound levels, so just wanted to let you know, whatever changed in these last two episodes has made a very positive difference and (as a person with hearing problems) I greatly appreciate it!

It was fantastic to hear from a person with a non-software background!

Please try to do that more often.  Super refreshing!
I like this guy.  Thumbs up for mentioning Mike Holmes.  Speaking of Mike Holmes, he needs to get on the DIY SE.
Steve Karantza was great! I could have listened to another hour. Great job guys!
I totally want a different non-tech subject each time now, it's interesting to hear how other non-software people talk shop.

Glad to hear others enjoyed the podcast as much as I did. It was a lot of fun to do, and the crew at SE are a great bunch of guys. The hour flew by. I am looking forward to hearing from other disciplines on future podcasts as well. Thanks for the nice comments.
